p: As a trial to improve the readout signal, combined IgM and IgG detection is recommended, this is done using a membrane-based chromatographic immunoassay to detect patient-generated antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 via coating a strip with SARS-CoV-2 antigens-AuNPs conjugates [ 145, 146]. This conjugate is able to bind any specific antibodies in the sample, producing a visible colored line within 10Â min (qualitative assay) [ 145].
